page.title: 10ON LOCATION
page.content: FOR 5 WEEKS IN APRIL 1985 A FILM COMPANY MAKING A THRILLER CALLED LINK CAME ON LOCATION TO ST ABBS .AS PART OF THE FILM, THERE WAS A HUGE EXPLOSION AND FIRE AT THE BIG VICTORIAN HOUSE,NORTHFIELD. THE FILM COMPANY BUILT FALSE WALLS AND A STABLE BLOCK OUT OF FIBERGLASS.THEY LOOKED VERY REAL BUT SOUNDED HOLLOW WHEN YOU TAP THEM.ONE OF THE STARS OF THE FILM WAS A CHIMPANZEE CALED MANDY. WHEN SHE CAME TO VISIT US IN SCHOOL, SHE WORE A BLUE T-SHIRT AND RED SHORTS. SHE WAS VERY FRENDLY AND GAVE US KISSES AND SHOWED US HER TEETH. WE GAVE HER BANANAS AND AN APPLE. SHE PAINTED A PICTURE AND PRETENDED TO READ A BOOK . SHE LIKED POLISHING THE FURNITURE TOO. WE ENJOYED MANDY'S VISIT VERY MUCH. ONE OF THE BOYS WAS CHOSEN TO APPEAR IN THE FILM IN A SMALL PART . IT WAS VERY EXCITING .
